name: Bombs 2 Peace
description:
"Please play on "Fantastic" setting"

An unidentified underwater mine has somehow entered the water cleaning plant . Your job is to remove the bomb without touching it and guiding it with the forces of the water waves to the area  where it can be defused . Do not touch the bomb. Your only way to move the bomb is using the water waves. 

Cick the water at any position and make the bomb move and rotate in the opposite direction. Make the bomb move towards the electrical defuser and you will proceed to next level. You have only 3 lives. If you touch the debris on the waterbed , the bomb will blast and your life will decrease.
